news.title: Israel says it will start talks to free all hostages as cabinet approves Gaza City assault
news.summary: Earlier this week, a Hamas source said the armed group had agreed to a temporary ceasefire proposal from mediators.

news.title: Erik Menendez denied parole three decades after killing his parents
news.summary: The younger of the Menendez brothers, who killed their parents in their Beverly Hills mansion, can try again for parole in three years.

news.title: Proposed Ukraine land concessions are Putin's trap, EU's top diplomat tells BBC
news.summary: Kaja Kallas warns in a BBC interview against pushing Ukraine to give up territories to Russia.

news.title: Travellers warned of bank holiday disruption
news.summary: A rail strike and works are expected this weekend as millions begin their bank holiday getaways.

news.title: US judge orders shutdown of Trump's 'Alligator Alcatraz' detention centre
news.summary: The order gave the Trump administration 60 days to wind down operations at the site, with no new detainees allowed.

news.title: Lil Nas X arrested and taken to hospital after wandering LA streets in underwear
news.summary: The LAPD allege the singer "charged" at them and was placed under arrest on suspicion of battery.

news.title: 'My dog was my ring bearer' - the pooches playing a starring role in weddings
news.summary: Many couples are including their pooch in their big day, we talk to some whose dogs have played a key role.

news.summary: Find out if you're forecast to become the BBC's next star meteorologist by playing our new guessing game

news.title: Anger in Italy over non-consensual photos of women shared online
news.summary: The My Wife Facebook group had 32,000 members before it was shut down for violating adult sexual exploitation policies.

news.title: Elon Musk and X reach settlement with axed Twitter workers
news.summary: Ex-Twitter staff sued the platform after some 6,000 employees were sacked in 2022.
